import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000/api';// Create axios instance with auth header
const authAxios=axios.create({baseURL:API_URL,headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});// Add token to requests if it exists
authAxios.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;});export const api={// Auth
login:credentials=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/auth/login"),credentials),getCurrentUser:()=>authAxios.get('/auth/me'),// Contact form
sendContactForm:data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/contact"),data),// Cars
getCars:()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/cars")),addCar:data=>authAxios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/cars"),data),deleteCar:id=>authAxios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/cars/").concat(id)),// Gallery
getGalleryImages:()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/gallery")),addGalleryImage:data=>authAxios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/gallery"),data),deleteGalleryImage:id=>authAxios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/gallery/").concat(id)),// Upload
uploadImage:formData=>authAxios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/upload/image"),formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}})};
